title: Dimanic queque!!!
body:
Hi Riot.
I have the greatetst idea.After that u mede the new champion slect I'm just wondering why dont you also make something like this for exemple I choose mid and I can choose ONLY MID champions the same as other lane s because I'm literallly feed up already from the start because I've been seen too many people torll like for exemple Gnar support, Blitzcranck jungle,Yasuo adc.What am I suppost to do play League of legends and having fun with it?? Thank you Riot

replies.body: Boy this was a trainwreck from start to finish
